Class DatabaseHelper

java.lang.Object
databasePart1.DatabaseHelper
public class DatabaseHelper extends Object
The DatabaseHelper class is responsible for managing the connection to the database, performing operations such as user registration, login validation, and handling invitation codes.

  • Method Details

    • connectToDatabase

      public void connectToDatabase() throws SQLException
      Connect to the database and create the framework if not found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Thrown if a connection is not made.

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Drops all objects from the database.

    • isDatabaseEmpty

      public boolean isDatabaseEmpty() throws SQLException
      Checks if the database is empty.
      Returns:
      Is the database empty?
      Throws:
      SQLException - Thrown if there is an issue with the connection.

    • register

      public void register(User user) throws SQLException
      Registers a new user. Input validation should be handled by the caller.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to be registered.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Thrown if there is an issue with the connection.

    • login

      public boolean login(User user) throws SQLException
      Log in as a user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to be logged in as.
      Returns:
      True if successful, false if not.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Thrown if there is an issue with the connection.

    • hasUsers

      public boolean hasUsers()
      Determines if the database has any users.
      Returns:
      True if there are any, false if empty.

    • doesUserExist

      public boolean doesUserExist(String userName)
      Checks if a user already exists in the database based on their userName.
      Parameters:
      userName - The user to be checked.
      Returns:
      True if user exists.

    • getUser

      public User getUser(String userName) throws SQLException
      Add method to get full user information
      Parameters:
      userName - The user to be looked up.
      Returns:
      A user based on that username.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Should be handled internally, just there for coverage.

    • getUserRole

      public String getUserRole(String userName)
      Retrieves the role of a user from the database using their UserName.
      Parameters:
      userName - The user that the role should be retrieved for.
      Returns:
      A string specifying the user's role.

    • setUserRole

      public void setUserRole(String userName, String role)
      Sets the role of a user from the database using their UserName.
      Parameters:
      userName - The user to be updated
      role - The role to be set

    • getAssociatedRole

      public String getAssociatedRole(String code)
      Retrieves the role associated with a given invite code.
      Parameters:
      code - The invitation code to be used
      Returns:
      A string specifying the role attached to the code.

    • updateUserInfo

      public void updateUserInfo(User user) throws SQLException
      Update the information for a given user
      Parameters:
      user - The user to be updated.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Should be handled internally.

    • getQuestionsAndAnswers

      public Questions getQuestionsAndAnswers() throws SQLException
      Gets all questions and answers in the database.
      Returns:
      A complete questions class with associations to answers.

      SQLException

    • generateInvitationCode

      public String generateInvitationCode(String role)
      Generates a new invitation code and inserts it into the database.
      Parameters:
      role - The role associated with the code
      Returns:
      The invite code

    • validateInvitationCode

      public boolean validateInvitationCode(String code)
      Determines whether the invite code is valid. Input validation is handled by this method.

      The code is marked as used when this method is called.

      Parameters:
      code - The code to be checked.
      Returns:
      True if it's valid.

    • getMessages

      public Messages getMessages() throws SQLException
      Gets all messages in the database.
      Returns:
      A messages collection.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Should be handled internally.

    • getMessagesByUser

      public Messages getMessagesByUser(User user, String otherUser) throws SQLException
      Gets all of the messages between two users.
      Parameters:
      user - The application's user
      otherUser - The username of the other user
      Returns:
      A messages collection
      Throws:
      SQLException - Should be handled internally.

    • getMessagesForConvo

      public Messages getMessagesForConvo(User user, String otherUser) throws SQLException
      Gets all of the messages in a given conversation.
      Parameters:
      user - The application's user
      otherUser - The user the conversation is between.
      Returns:
      A messages collection.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Should be handled internally.

      public void setMessageRead(Message message)
      Marks a message as read.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to be marked.

    • requestReviewerRole

      public void requestReviewerRole(String username) throws SQLException
      Inserts a user into the reviewerRequests database.

      For the sake of error messages, this method requires exception handling by the caller.

      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to be entered.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Handled by the caller. Usually a duplicate entry exception.

    • getReviewerRequests

      public ArrayList<String> getReviewerRequests() throws SQLException
      Gets an ArrayList of all of the usernames in the reviewerRequests database.
      Returns:
      The users in the reviewerRequests database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Should be handled internally, but throws this regardless.

    • getQuestionsByAuthor

      public Questions getQuestionsByAuthor(String author) throws SQLException
      Gets a set of questions written by an author. Should not be used for the main Q and A page.
      Parameters:
      author - The author who wrote the questions.
      Returns:
      The questions written by this author.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Unlikely to be thrown, but here for safety.

    • getAnswersByAuthor

      public Answers getAnswersByAuthor(String author) throws SQLException
      Gets a set of answers written by an author. Should not be used for the main Q and A page.
      Parameters:
      author - The author who wrote the answers.
      Returns:
      The answers written by this author.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Unlikely to be thrown, but here for safety.

    • rejectReviewerRequest

      public boolean rejectReviewerRequest(String requestUser)
      Delete a user from the requests database.
      Parameters:
      requestUser - The user who put out the request.
      Returns:
      True if the request is processed.
